result.execSummary:
The defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Resisting/Failing to Stop/Fleeing, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 346.04(2t).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui in court with attorney Brian Kinstler.  Defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui in custody.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  

Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.    Court sentenced defendant to serve 45 DAYS in the House of Correction CONSECUTIVE to any sentence; STRAIGHT TIME.   

Court ordered defendant to pay ALL COSTS and SURCHARGES by 01-17-2017 or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Attorney Brian Kinstler in court, defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui not in court, in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24 is in trial.  Defense requested a plea/sentencing date in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 15, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Brian Kinstler in court, defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui not in court, in custody.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Substitution of attorney addressed.  Defense requests another final pretrial date.  Court orders case adjourned to Branch 24.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Request, Consent and Order for Substitution of Attorneys for Defendant, filed.
Defendant's Jury Instructions received and filed with court.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT PRODUCED FROM MSDF FOR PURPOSES OF THE FINAL PRETRIAL AND JURY TRIAL IN BRANCH 24.

Attorney Maayan Silver in court, Defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui not in court, in custody.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense requesting an adjourned final pretrial and jury trial.  Jury trial scheduled for October 21, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 1, 2015 at 08:30 am. Court VACATED the 08-17-2015 Jury Trial.

Attorney Maayan Silver in court, defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui not in court, in custody.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  ORIGINAL COURT FILE IS UNAVAILABLE - COURT RECORD ENTRY IS MADE IN A DUPLICATE FILE.  Defense motion to modify bail argued and denied.  Defense requested a final pretrial and jury trial date in Branch 24.  Final pre-trial scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui in court with attorney Maayan Silver.  Defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Defendant was in custody on missed court date.  Scheduling conference scheduled for April 23, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 500.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui not in court.  Deann L Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant to be issued.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.

Defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui in court with attorney Maayan Silver.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has a pending matter in another Court.  Defendant wants this matter to stay in this court.  Defendant waiting to see if there is dash cam video.  Status conference scheduled for April 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for 03-03-2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Jorge M Lopeztegui Jr
Current: 3421 West North Avenue Apt 308, Milwaukee, WI 53208   (Effective: 02-26-2015)
Prior: 3421 West North Avenue Apt 308, Milwaukee, WI 53208

Defendant Jorge M Lopeztegui in court with attorney Maayan Silver.  Nathaniel E Adamson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant advised that this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.
Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.   Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel and maximum penalties.  Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant.
Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance.  Defendant IS Public Defender eligible.  Defendant is ordered to provide the public defender's office with the next court date.  The case is adjourned to Br.24  for a Pretrial Conference.vb
Defendant is Out-of-Custody. Court appearance in Out-Of-Custody Court, Room 221 Safety Building on 2-26-2015 at 1:30pm
